en.detail_close_word: This forecast is over. Please wait for the result. Thank you for your patience.
en.detail_published_word: The forecast has been awarded, and the winning result will be announced within one working day.
en.detail_game_type_info_1_1: 1x2 - Predict the outcome of the match (90 minutes plus injury time)
en.detail_game_type_info_1_2: Asian Handicap - Predict the outcome of the match (90 minutes plus injury time)
en.detail_game_type_info_1_3: O/U - Predict the game within 90 minutes (including injury time)
en.detail_game_type_info_matchwinner: Predict the result of a competition between two teams
en.detail_game_type_info_win_draw_lose: Predict the result of a competition between two teams
en.no_data1: Sorry, this prediction currently does not support the selected ({currency}), please switch to the right currency for prediction
en.no_data2: Sorry, the selected ({currency}) will be on chain soon, please wait
